title: Discoveries of the Deep Sea
description: We talk about an extreme environment which is stranger than fiction

vocabItems.word: like finding a needle in a haystack
vocabItems.definition: something that is impossible or very difficult to find because the area you have to search is so large
there are very few of something
there is more than enough of something
find out (or do) a small amount about something, but not enough to fully understand (or deal with) it

vocabItems.word: hard to get your head around
vocabItems.definition: difficult to fully understand or comprehend
